definition: service (work done for money)/services (as in "goods and services")
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
affair/business/matter/to be engaged in/to attend to/by all means

sentences.english: Chiway Education International Service Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 辽宁古银国际劳务合作有限公司。

sentences.english: Consumers are courted, enticed, and implored by sellers of goods and services.
sentences.chinese: 消费者受到商品和劳务出售者奉承。

sentences.english: The young man asked him to show how to operate that machine.
sentences.chinese: 把这年轻人带上岸并指给他去劳务市场的路。

sentences.english: I could pay for things with food or something.
sentences.chinese: 我可用食物或其它东西来换取劳务费呀。

sentences.english: Sale of goods or taxable services by small-scal e taxpayers.
sentences.chinese: 小规模纳税人销售货物或者应税劳务的。

sentences.english: Foreign project-contracting and labor services cooperation have made relatively large progress.
sentences.chinese: 对外承包工程和劳务合作取得较大成绩。

sentences.english: We can contract to build turn-key plant, undertake single items of projects as a subcontractor or provide labor services.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以承建成套工厂或分包单项工程或供给劳务。

sentences.english: The goods or services purchased are not for the use of principal and ancillary business operation.
sentences.chinese: 二非供本业及附属业务使用之货物或劳务。

sentences.english: We will increase the export of organized labor services and guide the orderly flow of rural migrant workers.
sentences.chinese: 加强有组织的劳务输出，引导农民工有序流动。

sentences.english: It is applicable to all formal employees and contracted workers at SFL.
sentences.chinese: 本文适用于全体舍佛勒员工，包括劳务输出员工。

sentences.english: Most of the money today is made of metal or paper. But people used to use all kinds of things as money.
sentences.chinese: 今天，人人都愿意接管货泉，用以换回商品和劳务。

sentences.english: Liaoning Guyin International Service Cooperation Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 辽宁古银国际劳务合作有限公司。

sentences.english: We provide labor service export for many Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 我们向亚洲国家提供劳务输出。

sentences.english: This Recognizance has same law duty as the work contract.
sentences.chinese: 本保证书与《劳务用工合同》具有同等法律约束力。

sentences.english: At last, it puts forward some suggestions for it…
sentences.chinese: 最后，提出了进一步扩大甘肃省劳务输转的建议。

sentences.english: Shanghai Nanny labor dispatch Co. , Ltd. is one of the Top 100 domestic labor dispatch enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 上海欣勤劳务派遣有限公司是全国百强家政企业之一。

definition: piece rate wage/remuneration based on one's output/opposite: time rate wage 計時工資|计时工资[ji4 shi2 gong1 zi1]
second party (law)/see also 甲方[jia3 fang1]
to undertake to perform work within a time limit and according to specifications/to contract for a job/contractor
to contract for an entire project
borrower/leaser/the hiring side of a contract
labor contract/contract between employer and employees governing wages and conditions
